alert.note: Alert for Butler; Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:01PM EDT until July 17 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Preble County in west central Ohio... Northeastern Butler County in southwestern Ohio... Southwestern Montgomery County in west central Ohio... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 801 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Camden, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Middletown, Monroe, Trenton, South Middletown, Camden, West Alexandria, Gratis, Seven Mile, Darrtown, Germantown, New Lebanon, Farmersville, Somerville, West Elkton, Jacksonburg, Collinsville, Poast Town Heights and Wheatville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
